name: Yallaiah Onteru
title: Salesforce Developer
professional_summary: Applied Salesforce development expertise to design and implement complex web applications, ensuring alignment with client security frameworks and high-level designs, which improved system efficiency.
Utilized Apex and Visualforce to develop custom solutions, addressing specific business requirements and enhancing user experience across multiple projects.
Integrated Salesforce with external systems like mainframes and web services, ensuring seamless data flow and system interoperability, which streamlined operations.
Developed and optimized database schemas within Salesforce to efficiently persist and manage data, supporting scalable application growth.
Implemented data conversion and system implementation plans, ensuring smooth transitions and minimal downtime during system upgrades.
Prepared and maintained comprehensive system and programming documentation, facilitating easier maintenance and future enhancements.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to analyze and devise logic procedures, preparing flowcharts and performing coding tasks to meet project requirements.
Conducted thorough testing and debugging of programs, ensuring high-quality deliverables and reducing post-deployment issues.
Worked on Salesforce Lightning components to modernize user interfaces, improving user engagement and accessibility.
Managed Salesforce environments using tools like Salesforce DX and Git, ensuring version control and efficient development workflows.
Implemented Salesforce security measures, including role-based access controls and data encryption, to protect sensitive information and comply with regulations.
Developed custom reports and dashboards in Salesforce, providing stakeholders with actionable insights and supporting data-driven decision-making.
Integrated Salesforce with third-party applications using RESTful APIs, enhancing system functionality and user productivity.
Performed code reviews and provided constructive feedback to team members, promoting best practices and improving code quality.
Participated in Agile ceremonies, contributing to sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospectives to ensure project alignment and timely delivery.
Troubleshot and resolved complex Salesforce issues, minimizing downtime and maintaining system reliability.
Mentored junior developers, sharing knowledge and best practices to enhance team capabilities and project outcomes.
Stayed updated with Salesforce releases and new features, proactively applying relevant updates to keep systems current and efficient.

Cloud Platforms: AWS (S3, SageMaker, Lambda, EC2, RDS, Redshift, Bedrock)
Azure (ML Studio, Data Factory, Databricks, Cosmos DB)
GCP (Big Query, Vertex AI, Cloud SQL)
